name: Sylas 'The Serpent' Starsong
description: A flamboyant and charismatic half-elf who frequents the Skewered Dragon. He dresses in dark, well-tailored leathers adorned with subtle silver snake motifs and carries himself with an air of uncanny luck and confidence.
ideals: Power: 'The Black Network offers true power to those clever enough to seize it.'
Wealth: 'Why earn a living when you can simply take it? Life is for the bold.'
Secrecy: 'The best weapon is the one your enemy never sees coming.'
bonds: His position within the Zhentarim, which provides him with wealth and protection.
His own reputation for being a lucky, untouchable agent.
flaws: His arrogance and belief in his own luck can make him reckless.
He enjoys the thrill of the game, sometimes toying with his victims.
motivations: To rise through the ranks of the Zhentarim.
To maintain his lifestyle of comfort and excitement, funded by his 'work.'
To keep the Zhentarim's local operations running smoothly and profitably.

canned_conversations.introduction: 'Well, well. What have we here? New faces are always a welcome diversion. Here to try your luck in the pit, or are you seeking a game with higher stakes?'
canned_conversations.ask_about_zhentarim: 'The Zhentarim? A fascinating group. They say they have friends everywhere, dedicated to their mutual prosperity. One must be careful who their friends are in this city, no?'
canned_conversations.confront_about_floon: '(He leans in, his charming smile never leaving his face, but his eyes turn cold as steel) You're playing a dangerous game asking questions like that. Fine. We were after Neverember. We thought he knew where his father stashed the Dragons. We grabbed the wrong man... the look-alike. Took him to the warehouse. But things got... messy. Another snake slithered into our nest. The Xanathar Guild. They made off with our prize. Now, if I were you, I'd forget this conversation ever happened.'
